documenttitle.text: Red Hat Security Advisory: openstack-octavia security update

note.text:
An update for openstack-octavia is now available for Red Hat OpenStack Platform 14.0 (Rocky).

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link in the References section.
note.title: Topic

note.text:
The OpenStack Load Balancing service (openstack-octavia) provides a Load Balancing-as-a-Service (LBaaS) version 2 implementation for Red Hat OpenStack platform director based installations.  

Security Fix(es):

* openstack-octavia: amphora-agent not requiring client certificate (CVE-2019-17134)

For more details about the security issue, including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page listed in the References section.
